Sore or cracked nipples
If your nipples hurt, take your 
baby	off	the	breast	and	start	
again. If the pain continues 
or your nipples start to crack 
or bleed, ask for help so 
you get your baby attached 
comfortably (see page 135 
for information on how to get 
help). It can sometimes
